shortTerm.title: Government Shutdown Jan 31
shortTerm.result: Shutdown started at midnight. Senate passed 71-29 but House not back until Monday.

shortTerm.title: Shutdown >2 Days
shortTerm.result: Shutdown lasted ~4 days. Trump signed funding bill Feb 4.

shortTerm.title: January 2026 Unemployment Rate >4.5%
shortTerm.reasoning: STRONG SETUP: Unemployment at 4.6% (4-year high). >4.4% trading at 36%. Need to stay above 4.5% for win. Settles TOMORROW 8:30 AM.

shortTerm.title: January 2026 Nonfarm Payrolls <=70k
shortTerm.reasoning: STRONG SETUP: Consensus 60k (Goldman 45k, ADP 22k). Need <70k for win. Settles TOMORROW 8:30 AM.

longTerm.title: OpenAI IPO Before Jun 1 2027
longTerm.reasoning: Speculative bet on OpenAI IPO timing. 16-month timeline.

longTerm.title: Jony Ive Device: Clip-on
longTerm.reasoning: Pure speculation on product form factor.

watchlist.title: Fed 25bp Cut at March FOMC
watchlist.reasoning: 64% on Kalshi vs 90% hold on CME FedWatch. Warsh nomination (May 2026) may push Fed to 'clear deck' with preemptive cut. CPI tomorrow is key catalyst.
watchlist.recommendation: BUY after CPI - if CPI <2.5% could jump to 80%+

watchlist.title: January CPI Release (Feb 12)
watchlist.reasoning: Releases Feb 12 8:30 AM. Currently sticky at 2.7%. Sub-2.5% would boost rate cut odds. Above 3% would tank them.
watchlist.recommendation: CATALYST - watch for Fed trade setup

watchlist.title: Supreme Court Rules for Trump Tariffs
watchlist.reasoning: Only 30% odds court upholds tariffs. V.O.S. Selections case pending. 3 justices expected to vote in favor (35% odds).
watchlist.recommendation: CONTRARIAN - consider NO position if price rises

watchlist.title: Number of Rate Cuts in 2026
watchlist.reasoning: Labor market weakening (4.6% unemployment, weak payrolls). Warsh transition in May. Market may be underpricing cuts.

opportunities.title: Fed March Rate Cut (Post-CPI Play)
opportunities.reasoning: If CPI comes in below 2.5% tomorrow, rate cut odds should spike. Entry at 64% with 80%+ upside potential.

opportunities.title: Supreme Court Strikes Down Tariffs
opportunities.reasoning: 70% probability court rules against. If conviction strengthens, NO price rises. Good risk/reward.

opportunities.title: No Greenland Deal by May 2026
opportunities.reasoning: Only 13% odds of deal by May. Very unlikely Denmark sells. Collect premium.

upcomingEvents.description: BLS Jobs Report - Unemployment & Payrolls settle. BOTH POSITIONS LOOKING STRONG.
January CPI Release - Key catalyst for Fed rate cut trade
March FOMC Meeting - potential 25bp cut (64% odds)
